article: us president barack obama thursday sharply warned lawmakers , including those in his democratic party , that they must answer to voters if they balk at passing his long-delayed health reforms .
abstract: obama warns voters will judge congress on health care
candidates: obama warns lawmakers they must answer to voters if they balk at passing his health reforms.
obama's health reforms have been delayed for years.
